headline: Amphenol Expands Fiber Reach With CommScope Deal And AI Data Center Push
summary: Amphenol (NYSE:APH) has agreed to acquire CommScope’s Connectivity and Cable Solutions division, representing a major move in fiber optic interconnects. The deal significantly expands Amphenol’s footprint in fiber solutions used in AI infrastructure and cloud data centers. The transaction is being framed as one of Amphenol’s largest acquisitions and a meaningful shift in its product mix. For investors watching Amphenol at a share price of $144.08, this acquisition follows very strong...
